mapper.select: SELECT stockCode, valueDate, openingPrice, topPrice, closingPrice, dailyGrowthRate,lowestPrice, turnoverValue, moneyValue FROM stockdata WHERE stockCode=#{stockCode} ORDER BY valueDate ASC;

SELECT stockCode, valueDate, openingPrice, topPrice, closingPrice, dailyGrowthRate,lowestPrice, turnoverValue, moneyValue FROM stockdata WHERE stockdata.stockCode = #{stockCode} AND DATE_FORMAT(stockdata.valueDate, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(stockdata.valueDate, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY valueDate ASC;
